scripts.test: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run migrate && node ./tests/routes/runner.js && npm run db:drop
scripts.db:create: PGPASSWORD='1121993' psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE test;' -U postgres -h localhost
scripts.db:drop: PGPASSWORD='1121993' psql -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS test;' -U postgres  -h localhost
scripts.test:local: npm run db:create && node tests/routes/runner.js && npm run db:drop
scripts.coverage: npm run db:create && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./test/runner.js && npm run db:drop
